parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The domain name.

>  You can specify only one domain name in each query.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range that can be specified is one year. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

*   Default value: **300**.
*   Valid values: **1 to 1000**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` format. The time must be in UTC.
